com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.forms

Class OdpSearchResultsDataGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rds_software.businesslogic.xwebapp.BusinessLogicDataGrid
      • com.rds_software.release.commons.businesslogic.simpleforms.SimpleDataGrid
        • com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.forms.OdpSearchResultsDataGrid
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OdpTasksResultDataGrid

    public class OdpSearchResultsDataGrid
extends com.rds_software.release.commons.businesslogic.simpleforms.SimpleDataGrid
    Data grid for displaying ODP (Ordine Di Pagamento - Payment Order) search results.

    This grid displays search results in a tabular format with the following columns:

    • AZIENDA - Company code
    • IT E - Internal/External indicator
    • ID - ODP identifier
    • P - Priority indicator
    • STATO - Status
    • NUMERO_PRO - Protocol number
    • IMPORTO - Amount
    • VALU - Currency
    • DATA_COMPILAZIO - Creation date
    • FAT - Invoice flag
    • STO - Historical flag
    • AZIONI - Actions column

    The grid provides user actions:

    • NewOdpAction - Create a new ODP (no selection required)
    • EditOdpAction - Edit an existing ODP (requires row selection)

    Search criteria are retrieved from the parent OdpSearchForm and mapped to OdpSearchCriteria for querying via IOdpService.

    Author:
    RDS Software
    See Also:
    OdpSearchForm, NewOdpAction, EditOdpAction, IOdpService
